# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $12000 to you, based on my understanding of your needs. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $11000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for, ensuring maximum efficiency and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
